name: Create Phantom Wallet
description: Instructions for creating a new Phantom wallet from scratch
instructions: Visit Chrome web store. You can visit https://chromewebstore.google.com/
In the search bar at the top of the chrome web store search phantom wallet
Click the search result with title 'Phantom'
Click create a seed phrase wallet
Write P@ssw0rd123 into Password input field and Confirm Password input field
Ask the user to reveal the phrases
Hit the extensions button and pin the extension
